definition: variant of 叫花子[jiao4 hua1 zi5]
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The tops of the beggar's shoes had worn so thin that his toes were poking through.
sentences.chinese: 叫化子的鞋幫磨得很薄，腳趾頭快要出來了。

sentences.english: I'm not asking any girl to marry a pauper.
sentences.chinese: 我是說我不會要求任何姑娘給一個叫化子。

sentences.english: Fuck the panhandlers grubbing for money.
Fuck the panhandlers grubbing for money, smiling at me behind my back.
sentences.chinese: 操那些要錢的叫化子，在他媽背後笑話我。
四個叫化子，一隻小黃鶯。

sentences.english: Beggar that I am, I am even poor in thanks. (II. 2)
sentences.chinese: 我樣的叫化子，我的感謝也是不值錢的。

definition: mute person/dumb person/(more commonly called 啞巴|哑巴[ya3 ba5])
